Articles.Content:
Played on patch 1 on windows 10 (CPU: Ryzen 5 3600 GPU: rtx 2060 6gb)
I made an interplanetary craft to Jool however on launch it was very wobbly so i put a lot of struts on it between the mothership and the lander craft on top. In interplanetary space I redocked the 2 ships, quick saved, quick loaded and all the struts were still there despite the crafts having undocked and the framerate tanked to about 5-10 fps. this poor framerate stays there in different planet systems. the framerate before undocking was about 15 fps in interstellar space
